MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes, affecting properties in Heathfield Park and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.55am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the area and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.02pm on 29th April 2021.
